channel.title: I need help with a 602 source
channel.description:
ok i have tried to run this source and it says cant find path specified... i changed it to my version of jdk which is jdk1.7.0_04 heres what it says in the run server batch file "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/java" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
i changed it so that all the / were \ and that didnt solve anything so i put it back to the default and now im wondering if i can get some kind people to help me on my server instead of flaming me like i have seen in other peoples posts asking for help:P thanks in advance -tom
additional info the whole run server batch file is this
@echo off title (my title) "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/java" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
the compiler doesnt work, same problem with the cant find... same with eco reset the client can find it and that works
also finally this was posted as an anti leech client and source so the owner DID give permission for people to use it

item.title: I need help with a 602 source
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

RESOLVED

to the above, that wasnt it but you made me double check my files and i found the problem so in a way i thank you

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with a 602 source
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

when you run with jre its [code]"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7/bin/java.exe"[/code] without the c, maybe this helps?

when you run with jre its "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7/bin/java.exe" without the c, maybe this helps?

item.title: I need help with a 602 source
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

ok i have tried to run this source and it says cant find path specified… i changed it to my version of jdk which is jdk1.7.0_04
heres what it says in the run server batch file
“C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/java” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server

i changed it so that all the / were
and that didnt solve anything so i put it back to the default and now im wondering if i can get some kind people to help me on my server instead of flaming me like i have seen in other peoples posts asking for help:P
thanks in advance
-tom

additional info
the whole run server batch file is this

@echo off
title (my title)
“C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/java” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

the compiler doesnt work, same problem with the cant find…
same with eco reset
the client can find it and that works

also finally this was posted as an anti leech client and source so the owner DID give permission for people to use it
